mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( uid, pay_type, amount, order_uid, order_name, user_uid, payment_key ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{pay_type}, #{amount}, #{order_uid}, #{order_name}, #{user_uid}, #{payment_key} )
mapper.update: update payment set status = #{status}, payment_key = #{payment_key}, approve_at = NOW(), failure_reason = #{failure_reason}, receipt_url = #{receipt_url} where order_uid = #{order_uid}
